header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Qatar's premier charity management platform

general.question: What is the Qatar Charity Platform?
general.answer: The Qatar Charity Platform is a comprehensive digital system for managing, monitoring, and regulating charitable donations and campaigns in Qatar. It integrates with the Sandi platform to ensure transparency, compliance, and efficient distribution of aid.

general.question: How does the platform ensure transparency?
general.answer: We use blockchain technology to create tamper-proof records of all transactions. Donors can track their contributions in real-time from donation to distribution, with proof of spending provided by charities.

general.question: Is my personal information secure?
general.answer: Yes, we employ bank-level security measures including encryption, secure servers, and compliance with Qatar data protection regulations. Your information is never shared without your consent.

general.question: What languages are supported?
general.answer: The platform is fully available in both Arabic and English, with plans to add more languages in the future based on user needs.

donors.question: How can I make a donation?
donors.answer: You can donate through multiple methods: credit/debit cards, bank transfer, QR code payments, or digital wallets. Simply register an account, browse campaigns, and select your preferred payment method.

donors.question: Will I receive a receipt for my donation?
donors.answer: Yes, you will receive an instant digital receipt for every donation, which can be used for tax purposes. All receipts are stored in your account dashboard for easy access.

donors.question: How can I track the impact of my donation?
donors.answer: Our real-time tracking system allows you to follow your donation from start to finish. You'll receive updates, photos, and reports showing how your contribution made a difference.

donors.question: Can I set up recurring donations?
donors.answer: Yes, you can set up monthly, quarterly, or annual recurring donations to your preferred charities with customizable amounts.

donors.question: Are there any fees for donating?
donors.answer: The platform charges a minimal processing fee of 1.5% to cover transaction costs and platform maintenance. Charities receive 98.5% of your donation amount.

charities.question: How can my organization register on the platform?
charities.answer: Charities must apply through the registration portal, providing all required documentation including valid licenses from RACA. The approval process typically takes 5-7 business days.

charities.question: What are the reporting requirements?
charities.answer: Registered charities must submit regular reports including proof of spending, beneficiary information, and impact assessments. The platform provides templates to simplify this process.

charities.question: How does the Sandi integration work?
charities.answer: The platform automatically syncs with Sandi to verify beneficiaries and prevent duplicate aid. Charities can access verified beneficiary lists and report distributions directly through the system.

charities.question: What support is available for charity administrators?
charities.answer: We provide comprehensive training, dedicated account managers, and 24/7 technical support to help charities maximize their use of the platform.

technical.question: What browsers are supported?
technical.answer: The platform works best on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers updated to their latest versions. For optimal experience, enable JavaScript and cookies.

technical.question: Is there a mobile app available?
technical.answer: Yes, we have native iOS and Android apps available for download from their respective app stores. The mobile apps offer all the functionality of the web platform.

technical.question: What if I encounter technical issues?
technical.answer: Our support team is available 24/7 through live chat, email, or phone. You can also visit our Help Center for troubleshooting guides and video tutorials.

technical.question: How often is the platform updated?
technical.answer: We release regular updates every two weeks with new features, security enhancements, and performance improvements. All updates are thoroughly tested before deployment.

support.title: Still have questions?
support.description: Our support team is ready to help you with any additional questions you might have about the platform.
